name: Doppelgänger (itch) (Frelon-K Games)
description:
Left and right to move.
Z to (re)start.

"I hate you
You're my worst enemy
But if you die
I also die..."

My first pico-8 project!

Don't expect too much! This is just a time-killer like many others. But I want to become familiar with pico-8 !

Have fun and try to survive as long as you can!

Frelon-K
